posts.name: Owen
posts.cooked:
This module was a 6 month solo project that I never expected to actually build. My team ended up running it at chezy champs this year. The module ran with zero issues and never even had to be touched. Its unfortunate that it is now illegal for 2024. Here’s the link to the public document: Onshape

Some general specs: roughly 7.8 lbs 4.4:1 drive ratio 2 NEO drive motors 1 NEO steer motor 18 ft/s or 15 mph theoretical top speed

posts.name: Eliot Dunn
posts.cooked:
image 787×617 78.3 KB image 472×601 62.1 KB image 466×510 44.3 KB Here’s some screenshots if you can’t open the CAD. It looks super cool, so sad that it got banned.

posts.name: Owen
posts.cooked: Thanks, We will probably run a modified version of it with a single falcon drive motor and NEO steer motor for '24 if the game allows.

posts.name: Eliot Dunn
posts.cooked: Just wondering, what current limit did you put on the NEOs? Did you have any brownouts?

posts.name: Owen
posts.cooked: I put a current limit of 40 amps and yes we had some brownouts but when we ran a borrowed battery from a few teams we had no problem so I’m assuming that those were not directly caused by running this many motors.
